name: bs4-homepage
description: A starter template for prototyping Bootstrap 4 homepage layouts. Add, remove, edit or mix and match components as needed.

name: bmjs-engverb
description: An English utility designed for generating a verbs's different forms from a given string, including support for irregular verbs with common prefixes like 'un-' or 're-'.

name: bmjs-engperson
description: An English language utility for checking if a given pronoun is first-person, singular or plural.

name: bmjs-random
description: A simple function to give you a random selection from input parameters.
